articles.author: Suzanne Nuyen
articles.title: Up First briefing: American credit card debt; Tiny Desk 2024 winner - NPR
articles.description: Nearly 1 in 5 Americans have maxed out their credit card borrowing, according to the Federal Reserve Bank in New York. Tiny Desk Contest crowns its 10th anniversary winner.
articles.content:
